typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	row_num as integer (0),
	date as string ('1899-01-01')
}
source(output(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as timestamp,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as integer,
		ESTD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPTR as timestamp,
		FLT_DT as date,
		FLT_ID as long,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as string,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as timestamp,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		DLAY_TYP as string,
		DURTN_MNT as integer,
		DLAY_CD as string,
		DLAY_CD_NAME as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT * FROM [dbo].[S_FLIGHTS] where  UPDTD_AT > '"+$date+"'"),
	format: 'query') ~> StagingFlights
source(output(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ARPT
source(output(
		CLNDR_ID as string,
		TheDate as date,
		TheDay as integer,
		TheDaySuffix as string,
		TheDayName as string,
		TheDayOfWeek as integer,
		TheDayOfWeekInMonth as integer,
		TheDayOfYear as integer,
		IsWeekend as integer,
		TheWeek as integer,
		TheISOweek as integer,
		TheFirstOfWeek as date,
		TheLastOfWeek as date,
		TheWeekOfMonth as integer,
		TheMonth as integer,
		TheMonthName as string,
		TheFirstOfMonth as date,
		TheLastOfMonth as date,
		TheFirstOfNextMonth as date,
		TheLastOfNextMonth as date,
		TheQuarter as integer,
		TheFirstOfQuarter as date,
		TheLastOfQuarter as date,
		TheYear as integer,
		TheISOYear as integer,
		TheFirstOfYear as date,
		TheLastOfYear as date,
		IsLeapYear as boolean,
		Has53Weeks as integer,
		Has53ISOWeeks as integer,
		MMYYYY as string,
		Style101 as string,
		Style103 as string,
		Style112 as string,
		Style120 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CLNDR
source(output(
		FLGHT_ID as integer,
		FLGHT_DT_ID as integer,
		FLGHT_NUM as string,
		FLGHT_TYP as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYP as string,
		SCHDD_DPRT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPRT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		BASE_ARPT_CD as string,
		BASE_ARPT_ID as integer,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_CD as string,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID as integer,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_CD as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID as integer,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_CD as string,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID as integer,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_CD as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID as integer,
		FUEL_IN as string,
		FUEL_OUT as integer,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		CRGO_WT as integer,
		MAINT_LOG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		DEP_VAR as integer,
		ARRVL_VAR as integer,
		SCHDD_BLK_DUR as integer,
		ACTL_BLK_DUR as integer,
		ACTL_FLGHT_DUR as integer,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D0_IND as integer,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D15_IND as integer,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A0_IND as integer,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A14_IND as integer,
		BLK_DUR_B0_IND as integer,
		SCHDD_FLT_DUR as string,
		DELAY_TYP as string,
		DELAY_DUR as integer,
		DELAY_CD as string,
		DELAY_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Flights
StagingFlights filter(FLT_TYPE <=>'flight') ~> FilterFlightType
FilterFlightType, FilterActvInd lookup(BASE_AIR_PORT == ARPT_IATA_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIATA
ARPT filter(ACTV_IND == 'Y') ~> FilterActvInd
LookupIATA select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		IATA_ARPT_ID = ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1, FilterActvInd lookup(BASE_AIR_PORT == ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupICAO
LookupICAO derive(BASE_ARPT_ID = iif(isNull(IATA_ARPT_ID), ARPT_ID, IATA_ARPT_ID)) ~> AddBaseAirportID
AddBaseAirportID select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveIATAICAO
RemoveIATAICAO, FilterActvInd lookup(SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ARPT_IATA_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIATA2
LookupIATA2 select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		IATA_ARPT_ID = ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns2
RemoveColumns2, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupICAO2
LookupICAO2 derive(SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID = iif(isNull(IATA_ARPT_ID), ARPT_ID, IATA_ARPT_ID)) ~> AddSchdDptrID
AddSchdDptrID select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveIATAICAO2
RemoveIATAICAO2, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ARPT_IATA_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIATA3
LookupIATA3 select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		IATA_ARPT_ID = ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns3
RemoveColumns3, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupICAO3
LookupICAO3 derive(SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID = iif(isNull(IATA_ARPT_ID), ARPT_ID, IATA_ARPT_ID)) ~> AddSchdArrID
AddSchdArrID select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveIATAICAO3
RemoveIATAICAO3, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ARPT_IATA_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIATA4
LookupIATA4 select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		IATA_ARPT_ID = ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns4
RemoveColumns4, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupICAO4
LookupICAO4 derive(ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID = iif(isNull(IATA_ARPT_ID), ARPT_ID, IATA_ARPT_ID)) ~> AddActArrID
AddActArrID select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveIATAICAO4
RemoveIATAICAO5 derive(DEP_VAR = ACTL_OOOI_OUT - SCHDD_DPTR,
		ARRVL_VAR = ACTL_OOOI_IN - SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_BLK_DUR = SCHDD_DPTR - SCHDD_ARRVL,
		ACTL_BLK_DUR = ACTL_OOOI_OUT - ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_FLGHT_DUR = ACTL_OOOI_OUT - ACTL_OOOI_IN) ~> AddNewColumns
AddNewColumns derive(DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D0_IND = iif(DEP_VAR>0||isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), 0, 1),
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D15_IND = iif(DEP_VAR>15||isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), 0, 1),
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A0_IND = iif(ARRVL_VAR>0||isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), 0, 1),
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A14_IND = iif(ARRVL_VAR>14||isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), 0, 1),
		BLK_DUR_B0_IND = iif(ACTL_BLK_DUR>0||isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), 0, 1),
		SCHDD_FLT_DUR = '',
		row_num = $row_num+1) ~> AddNewColumns2
RemoveIATAICAO4, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ARPT_IATA_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIATA5
LookupIATA5 select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,

		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		IATA_ARPT_ID = ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns5
RemoveColumns5, FilterActvInd lookup(ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT == ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupICAO5
LookupICAO5 derive(ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID = iif(isNull(IATA_ARPT_ID), ARPT_ID, IATA_ARPT_ID)) ~> AddActlDptrID
AddActlDptrID select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveIATAICAO5
DoesntExists window(over(row_num),
	asc(row_num, true),
	FLGHT_ID = $row_num + rowNumber()) ~> SetRowNumber
AddNewColumns2, CLNDR lookup(FLT_DT == TheDate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCLNDR
LookupCLNDR select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		CRGO_WGT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT,
		FLT_ID,
		FLT_NUM,
		FLT_TYPE,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP,
		DURTN_MNT,
		DLAY_CD,
		DLAY_CD_NAME,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID,
		DEP_VAR,
		ARRVL_VAR,
		SCHDD_BLK_DUR,
		ACTL_BLK_DUR,
		ACTL_FLGHT_DUR,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D0_IND,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D15_IND,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A0_IND,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A14_IND,
		BLK_DUR_B0_IND,
		SCHDD_FLT_DUR,
		row_num,
		CLNDR_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveCLNDRColumns
RemoveCLNDRColumns, Flights exists(iif(FLT_NUM == FLGHT_NUM
	&& CLNDR_ID == toString(FLGHT_DT_ID)
	&& (SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT == SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_CD
	|| SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT == SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_CD),true(),false()),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesntExists
SetRowNumber sink(input(
		FLGHT_ID as integer,
		FLGHT_DT_ID as integer,
		FLGHT_NUM as string,
		FLGHT_TYP as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYP as string,
		SCHDD_DPRT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPRT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN_TS_UTC as timestamp,
		BASE_ARPT_CD as string,
		BASE_ARPT_ID as integer,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_CD as string,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID as integer,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_CD as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID as integer,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_CD as string,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID as integer,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_CD as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID as integer,
		FUEL_IN as string,
		FUEL_OUT as integer,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		CRGO_WT as integer,
		MAINT_LOG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		DEP_VAR as integer,
		ARRVL_VAR as integer,
		SCHDD_BLK_DUR as integer,
		ACTL_BLK_DUR as integer,
		ACTL_FLGHT_DUR as integer,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D0_IND as integer,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D15_IND as integer,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A0_IND as integer,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A14_IND as integer,
		BLK_DUR_B0_IND as integer,
		SCHDD_FLT_DUR as string,
		DELAY_TYP as string,
		DELAY_DUR as integer,
		DELAY_CD as string,
		DELAY_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FLGHT_ID,
		FLGHT_DT_ID = CLNDR_ID,
		FLGHT_NUM = FLT_NUM,
		FLGHT_TYP = FLT_TYPE,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYP = AIR_CRAFT_TYPE,
		SCHDD_DPRT_TS_UTC = SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_TS_UTC = SCHDD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPRT_TS_UTC = ESTD_DPTR,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TS_UTC = ESTD_ARRVL,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT_TS_UTC = ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF_TS_UTC = ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON_TS_UTC = ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN_TS_UTC = ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		BASE_ARPT_CD = BASE_AIR_PORT,
		BASE_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_CD = SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_DRPT_ARPT_ID,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_CD = SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_CD = ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_ARRVL_ARPT_ID,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_CD = ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT,
		ACTL_DPTR_ARPT_ID,
		FUEL_IN,
		FUEL_OUT,
		FUEL_UPLIFT,
		CRGO_WT = CRGO_WGT,
		MAINT_LOG = MAINT_LOG_PG,
		NOTES,
		IS_CNCLD,
		IS_VERFD,
		DEP_VAR,
		ARRVL_VAR,
		SCHDD_BLK_DUR,
		ACTL_BLK_DUR,
		ACTL_FLGHT_DUR,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D0_IND,
		DPRT_DELAY_DUR_D15_IND,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A0_IND,
		ARRVL_DELAY_DUR_A14_IND,
		BLK_DUR_B0_IND,
		SCHDD_FLT_DUR,
		DELAY_TYP = DLAY_TYP,
		DELAY_DUR = DURTN_MNT,
		DELAY_CD = DLAY_CD,
		DELAY_DESC = DLAY_CD_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Write

parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	date as string ('1899-01-01 00:00:00.000')
}
source(output(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as string,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ArptBlob
FilterByDate derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddADFColumns
ArptBlob filter(toDate(LAST_UPDT_DT)  > toDate($date) && toDate(LAST_UPDT_DT) < currentDate()) ~> FilterByDate
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE,
		LAST_UPDT_DT,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StgAirports

parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	date as string ('1899-01-01')
}
source(output(
		eqp_sched_id as string,
		ac_registration as string,
		status_code as string,
		status_name as string,
		status_description as string,
		start_time as string,
		end_time as string,
		notes as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> StgEquipSchd
FilterByDate split(isNull(ac_registration) || iif(isNull(end_time), false(), iif(isNull(start_time), false(), start_time>end_time)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilteredData)
ConditionalSplit1@Reject derive(REJECT_REASON = "Data Validation Error",
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns
ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns2
StgEquipSchd filter(toDate(updated_at)  > toDate($date) && toDate(updated_at) < currentDate()) ~> FilterByDate
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as timestamp,
		END_TIME as timestamp,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		REJECT_REASON as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EQP_SCHED_ID = eqp_sched_id,
		AC_RGSTRN = ac_registration,
		STS_CD = status_code,
		STS_NAME = status_name,
		STS_DESC = status_description,
		STRT_TIME = start_time,
		END_TIME = end_time,
		NOTE = notes,
		IS_DELD = is_deleted,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at,
		REJECT_REASON,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EquipReject
AddADFColumns2 sink(input(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EQP_SCHED_ID = eqp_sched_id,
		AC_RGSTRN = ac_registration,
		STS_CD = status_code,
		STS_NAME = status_name,
		STS_DESC = status_description,
		STRT_TIME = start_time,
		END_TIME = end_time,
		NOTE = notes,
		IS_DELD = is_deleted,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EquipStg

parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	date as string ('')
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		base_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		fuel_out as string,
		fuel_in as string,
		fuel_uplift as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> StgFlights
source(output(
		Airport_Name as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		IATA as string,
		ICAO as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Altitude as integer,
		UTC_offset as double,
		DST as string,
		Time_Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BdavisAirport
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as string,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> FlightsDelay
FilterRows split(isNull(flight_date) || isNull(flight_id) || isNull(flight_number) || isNull(flight_type) || isNull(SCHDD_DPTR) || isNull(UPDTD_AT),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NullReject, NullAcpt)
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists1
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(toString(actual_arrival_airport)  == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists
IATAAirportExists, ICAOAirportExists union(byName: true)~> ExsistUnion
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists
AddRejectReason2, UnionOOOIRejection union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion1
ConditionalSplit1@NullReject derive(Reject_Reason = "Null Error") ~> NullRejectReason
ICAOAirportdoesntExists derive(Reject_Reason = "Invalid ACTL_ARRVL Airport Name") ~> AddRejectReason2
ConditionalSplit6@EstSchdAcpt split(isNull(actual_arrival_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(ActlArrvlAirportNull, ActlArrvlAirportNotNull)
ExsistUnion, ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion1
FilterUnion1 split(isNull(actual_departure_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(ActlDptrAirportNull, ActlDptrAirportNotNull)
ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_departure_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists2, BdavisAirport exists(actual_departure_airport == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists2, BdavisAirport exists(actual_departure_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists2
ICAOAirportdoesntExists2 derive(Reject_Reason = "Actl Dptr Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason3
RejectUnion1, AddRejectReason3 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion2
ExistUnion2, ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion2
FilterUnion2 split(isNull(base_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit4@(BaseAirportNull, BaseAirportNotNull)
ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(base_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists3
ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(base_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists3
ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_departure_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists3, BdavisAirport exists(base_airport == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists3
IATAAirportDoesntExists3, BdavisAirport exists(base_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists3
ExistUnion3, ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion3
ICAOAirportdoesntExists3 derive(Reject_Reason = "Base Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason4
ICAOAirportExists2, IATAAirportExists2 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion2
IATAAirportExists3, ICAOAirportExists3 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion3
RejectUnion2, AddRejectReason4 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion3
FilterUnion3 split(isNull(scheduled_arrival_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> SchdArrvlAirportNull@(SchdArrvlAirportNull, SchdArrvlAirportNotNull)
SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists4
IATAAirportDoesntExists4, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_arrival_airport == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists4
IATAAirportDoesntExists4, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_arrival_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportDoesntExists4
SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists4
ICAOAirportExists4, IATAAirportExists4 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion4
ExistUnion4, SchdArrvlAirportNull@SchdArrvlAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion4
ICAOAirportDoesntExists4 derive(Reject_Reason = "Schd Arrvl Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason5
FilterUnion4 split(isNull(scheduled_departure_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> SchdDptrAirportNull@(SchdDptrAirportNull, SchdDptrAirportNotNull)
SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_departure_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists5
IATAAirportDoesntExists5, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_departure_airport == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists5
IATAAirportDoesntExists5, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_departure_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportDoesntExists5
SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(scheduled_departure_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists5
ICAOAirportExists5, IATAAirportExists5 union(byName: true)~> ExistUnion5
ExistUnion5, SchdDptrAirportNull@SchdDptrAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion5
ICAOAirportDoesntExists5 derive(Reject_Reason = "Schd Dptr Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason6
RejectUnion3, AddRejectReason5 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion4
RejectUnion4, AddRejectReason6 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion5
RejectUnion5 derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns
FlightsJoinFlightsDelay derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns2
FilterUnion5, FlightsDelay join(FilterUnion5@flight_id == FlightsDelay@flight_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FlightsJoinFlightsDelay
StgFlights derive(ACTL_OOOI_IN = toTimestamp(actual_oooi_in),
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF = toTimestamp(actual_oooi_off),
		ACTL_OOOI_ON = toTimestamp(actual_oooi_on),
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT = toTimestamp(actual_oooi_out),
		ESTD_ARRVL = toTimestamp(estimated_arrival),
		ESTD_DPTR = toTimestamp(estimated_departure),
		SCHDD_ARRVL = toTimestamp(scheduled_arrival),
		SCHDD_DPTR = toTimestamp(scheduled_departure),
		UPDTD_AT = toTimestamp(updated_at)) ~> TypeConvertion
TypeConvertion select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		maint_log_page,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		UPDTD_AT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates filter(toDate(UPDTD_AT)  > toDate($date) && toDate(UPDTD_AT) < currentDate()) ~> FilterRows
ConditionalSplit1@NullAcpt split(iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), false(), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_IN>ACTL_OOOI_OUT), ACTL_OOOI_IN<ACTL_OOOI_ON)) || 
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), false(),true()), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), false(), ACTL_OOOI_OFF<ACTL_OOOI_OUT)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_ON), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_IN), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), false(),true()),true()),iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), false(), ACTL_OOOI_ON<=ACTL_OOOI_OFF)) ||
iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OUT), iif(isNull(ACTL_OOOI_OFF), false(), true()), false()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit5@(OOOIReject, OOOIAcpt)
ConditionalSplit5@OOOIReject derive(Reject_Reason = "OOOI Validation Error") ~> OOOIRejectReason
ConditionalSplit5@OOOIAcpt split(iif(isNull(ESTD_ARRVL), iif(isNull(ESTD_DPTR), false(), true()), ESTD_ARRVL<ESTD_DPTR) ||
iif(isNull(SCHDD_ARRVL), true(), SCHDD_ARRVL<SCHDD_DPTR),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit6@(EstSchdReject, EstSchdAcpt)
ConditionalSplit6@EstSchdReject derive(Reject_Reason = "Estimated or Scheduled Arrival Validation Error") ~> EstSchdRejectReason
EstSchdRejectReason, NullRejectReason union(byName: true)~> UnionNullRejection
UnionNullRejection, OOOIRejectReason union(byName: true)~> UnionOOOIRejection
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as timestamp,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as integer,
		ESTD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPTR as timestamp,
		FLT_DT as date,
		FLT_ID as long,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as string,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as timestamp,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		REJECT_REASON as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = actual_arrival_airport,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT = actual_departure_airport,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM = aircraft_registration_number,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE = aircraft_type,
		BASE_AIR_PORT = base_airport,
		CRGO_WGT = cargo_weight,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT = flight_date,
		FLT_ID = flight_id,
		FLT_NUM = flight_number,
		FLT_TYPE = flight_type,
		FUEL_IN = fuel_in,
		FUEL_OUT = fuel_out,
		FUEL_UPLIFT = fuel_uplift,
		IS_CNCLD = is_canceled,
		IS_VERFD = is_verified,
		MAINT_LOG_PG = maint_log_page,
		NOTES = notes,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = scheduled_arrival_airport,
		SCHDD_DPTR,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT = scheduled_departure_airport,
		UPDTD_AT,
		REJECT_REASON = Reject_Reason,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Reject
AddADFColumns2 sink(input(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as timestamp,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as timestamp,

		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as integer,
		ESTD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		ESTD_DPTR as timestamp,
		FLT_DT as date,

		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as string,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as timestamp,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as timestamp,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		DLAY_TYP as string,

		DLAY_CD as string,
		DLAY_CD_NAME as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = actual_arrival_airport,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT = actual_departure_airport,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM = aircraft_registration_number,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE = aircraft_type,
		BASE_AIR_PORT = base_airport,
		CRGO_WGT = cargo_weight,
		ESTD_ARRVL,
		ESTD_DPTR,
		FLT_DT = flight_date,
		FLT_ID = FilterUnion5@flight_id,
		FLT_NUM = flight_number,
		FLT_TYPE = flight_type,
		FUEL_IN = fuel_in,
		FUEL_OUT = fuel_out,
		FUEL_UPLIFT = fuel_uplift,
		IS_CNCLD = is_canceled,
		IS_VERFD = is_verified,
		MAINT_LOG_PG = maint_log_page,
		NOTES = notes,
		SCHDD_ARRVL,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = scheduled_arrival_airport,
		SCHDD_DPTR,

		UPDTD_AT,
		DLAY_TYP = delay_type,
		DURTN_MNT = duration_mins,
		DLAY_CD = delay_code,
		DLAY_CD_NAME = delay_code_name,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StagingFlights
